name: Farm Garden Mania
description:
Farm Garden Mania is a very addictive casual game and puzzle game!
Enjoy and try to solve all the challenging puzzles! Have fun in your own splashy adventure.
Farm Garden Mania features:
- many cute animal
- Colorful and HD graphics
- Bright and colorful elements
- Small size but super amazing effects
- Many levels waiting for you challenge!

How to play:
- Connect more in limited time
- Achieve the target score can go to the next level
- Clever use of super animal to create massive combos!

Connect the cute animal as fast as you can!
